document_data.name: Final Chord
document_data.symbol: Silver jambiya with silver bells tied to the hilt
document_data.enemies: [[Cities of the Pantheon|Pantheists]], the [[Storm Which Destroys]]
document_data.mainbody:
The '''Final Chord''' was a [[holy slayer]] organization in [[Zakhara]] dedicated to the teachings of [[Bala]], the Zakharan goddess of music.{{cite book/Land of Fate/Fortunes and Fates|25-26}}

The symbol of the Final Chord was a silver [[jambiya]] adorned with silver bells.
document_data.Activities:
[[Image:FinalChord.PNG|thumb|left|''A deadly and determined member of the Final Chord.'']]
The Final Chord avoided unwanted attention by keeping an extremely low profile.

Targets for their assassinations included supporters of the Pantheon and members of the [[Storm Which Destroys]].
document_data.History: Followers of Bala were persecuted by the [[Cities of the Pantheon|Pantheist League]] for centuries. Because of this, representatives of the Pantheist League became important targets for the holy slayers of the Final Chord, particularly within the city of [[Mahabba]].
document_data.Organization: A rumor existed that members of the Final Chord were trained deep within the [[Grey Jungle]].
document_data.Base of Operations: Though they lacked a specific base, members of the Final Chord were found throughout the Cities of the Pantheon as well as the [[Cities of the Ancients|Ruined Kingdoms]].
